review_title: Amazing fabric and thickness, just too snug for large head.
reviews:
A very good quality hat but unfortunately too snug for a big header like myself.

I tried on the black, brown and grey. All we're incredibly thick with good material. Size was my only issue, once I folded the beanie to wear it with it's logo out it was just the smallest amount too tight.

Great for any others!

My girlfriend had one of these that sadly broke. I ordered this one to replace it and she loved it.

It's glass, well painted like her last one and doesn't feel cheap at all.

review_title: Gamers dream of lower priced mouse.
reviews:
I've used this mouse about 3 months and it's the gamers dream of a low priced mouse.

It's very receptive and performs good in games. Excellent for us with larger hands. Left and right click are fast, the side buttons are easy to hit but for some reason reversed. (Button remapping for those are necessary)

The DPI switching is easy with the centre button and the appearance of the mouse and lights look great.

Very durable as well (Spilled juice on it, dropped it a few times) and it's still good as new after a cleaning.

I'd recommend this for anyone after a quality gaming mouse or even their first gaming mouse while on a budget.
Worked perfectly and contains a lot space.
